verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD רֹ֝עִ֗י <S%H7462><s%> [is] my shepherd לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not אֶחְסָֽר׃ <S%H2637><s%> I shall not want

בִּנְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> pastures דֶּ֭שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> in green יַרְבִּיצֵ֑נִי <S%H7257><s%> He maketh me to lie down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside מֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> waters מְנֻח֣וֹת <S%H4496><s%> me beside the still יְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5095><s%> he leadeth

נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> my soul יְשׁוֹבֵ֑ב <S%H7725><s%> He restoreth יַֽנְחֵ֥נִי <S%H5148><s%> he leadeth בְמַעְגְּלֵי־ <S%H4570><s%> me in the paths צֶ֝֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> for his name's

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Even כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though אֵלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּגֵ֪יא <S%H1516><s%> through the valley צַלְמָ֡וֶת <S%H6757><s%> of the shadow of death לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אִ֘ירָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> I will fear רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> no evil כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> though אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> me שִׁבְטְךָ֥ <S%H7626><s%> for thou [art] with me thy rod וּ֝מִשְׁעַנְתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H4938><s%> and thy staff הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יְנַֽחֲמֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> they comfort

תַּעֲרֹ֬ךְ <S%H6186><s%> Thou preparest לְפָנַ֨י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before שֻׁלְחָ֗ן <S%H7979><s%> a table נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> the presence צֹרְרָ֑י <S%H6887><s%> me in the presence of mine enemies דִּשַּׁ֖נְתָּ <S%H1878><s%> thou anointest בַשֶּׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <S%H7218><s%> my head כּוֹסִ֥י <S%H3563><s%> my cup רְוָיָֽה׃ <S%H7310><s%> runneth over

אַ֤ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> Surely ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Surely goodness וָחֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and mercy יִ֭רְדְּפוּנִי <S%H7291><s%> shall follow כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> me all the days חַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> of my life וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <S%H3427><s%> and I will dwell בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְאֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> forever יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> the days
